item.title: What's Been Going On This Week
item.description: This week's Newsblade top picks from around the cryptointernets.
item.author: news@altcointrading.net
item.dc:creator: KarlvonBahnhof, info@altcointrading.net
item.content:encoded:
More of practical discussion in anonymizing Bitcoin transactions via coinjoin and similar (Bitcoin-Dev mailing list in January 2019)

[Read it]

ICE Updated their Bakkt specs page

[Read it]

Asian dApp games are rife with Chinese New Year deals

[Read it]

Tradeblock compares centralized vs non-custodial exchanges in terms of traded volume, fees and regulations

[Read it]

Amazon Partners On New Ethereum Marketplace For Enterprises / via @forbes

[Read it]

Blockstream proposes a centralized solution to BTC fragmented liquidity - sidechain where tx are validated by big trading houses lie Bitfinex, OKCoin or Rock Trading / via @forbes

[Read it]

Tooling for crypto traders - Reddit Sentiment Analysis with link to full code so that you can literally $DYOR. By @rados_io

[Read it]

item.title: Recently Updated Articles on AltcoinTrading.NET:
item.description: Articles updated within the last week to day.
item.author: info@altcointrading.net
item.dc:creator: KvB
item.content:encoded:
Crypto Wallets by Use Case

Updated at 09 Oct 2019, 20:33 UTC in #BASICS - Arguably the core of 'be your own bank' principle - How did crypto wallets evolve and what are the features you're looking for, as a trader?

[Read it]

Why Are So Many People Trading Cryptocurrency?

Updated at 09 Oct 2019, 20:33 UTC in #BASICS - The crypto trading statistics from Google Trends show a new wave of interest in trading of digital currencies.

[Read it]

Cryptocurrency Strategy for Beginners

Updated at 09 Oct 2019, 19:17 UTC in #BASICS - Lo and behold, there is a strategy even to hodling.

[Read it]

The True Crypto Fundamentals: Crypto Mining and Transactions

Updated at 09 Oct 2019, 20:33 UTC in #BASICS - Crypto mining is the true fundamental limit of all PoW cryptocurrencies. Transactions, a somewhat softer fundamental, can also provide some guidance. Learn the basics of the nature of these crypto fundamentals.

[Read it]

Wyckoff Avoidance Strategy in Cryptocurrency Trading

Updated at 09 Oct 2019, 20:33 UTC in #TRADING - Wyckoff method of avoidance means to trade only the best stocks in the leading sectors. How to apply this motto when trading cryptocurrencies?

[Read it]

Crypto vs Forex Trading: How do they compare?

Updated at 07 Oct 2019, 13:20 UTC in #TRADING - Are you better off trading bitcoin or forex? Ultimately, itâ€™s about picking the battles, and the right trading strategy.

[Read it]

Fundamental Value of Cryptoassets

Updated at 09 Oct 2019, 20:33 UTC in #TRADING - How to assess the fundamental value of alternative cryptocurrencies. Some cryptocoins serve for payments and remittance, some are dApp fuel tokens, some are quick spinoffs only used for pump and dump schemes.

[Read it]

Script Spotlight: Detrended Price Oscillator (DPO)

Updated at 09 Oct 2019, 20:33 UTC in #TRADING - The Detrended Price Oscillator strategy tool from TradingView is similar to a moving average, but easier to read.

[Read it]
